net.kuujo.vertigo.rpc

Interface Executor<T extends Executor<T>>

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Component<T>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    PollingExecutor, StreamExecutor
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractExecutor, DefaultPollingExecutor, DefaultStreamExecutor

    public interface Executor<T extends Executor<T>>
extends Component<T>
    A network executor. Executors may be used to execute portions of networks as remote procedures. Executors work by exploiting circular connections between components. Thus, when using an executor the network must be setup in a specific manner.
    Author:
    Jordan Halterman

      • setAutoRetry

        T setAutoRetry(boolean retry)
        Sets the executor auto-retry option. If this option is enabled, the executor will automatically retry sending timed out messages.
        Parameters:
        retry - Indicates whether to automatically executor emitting timed out data.
        Returns:
        The called executor instance.

      • isAutoRetry

        boolean isAutoRetry()
        Gets the executor auto-retry option. If this option is enabled, the executor will automatically retry sending timed out messages.
        Returns:
        Indicates whether the executor with automatically retry emitting timed out data.

      • setRetryAttempts

        T setRetryAttempts(int attempts)
        Sets the number of automatic retry attempts for a single timed out message.
        Parameters:
        attempts - The number of retry attempts allowed. If attempts is -1 then an infinite number of retry attempts will be allowed.
        Returns:
        The called executor instance.

      • getRetryAttempts

        int getRetryAttempts()
        Gets the number of automatic retry attempts.
        Returns:
        Indicates the number of retry attempts allowed for the executor.
